metadata.dc:title: Attitudes Concerning Falls in the Elderly. Part II: “The elderly person who falls while under our care”
metadata.dc:description: Our personal experience and analysis of thefalls suffered by elderly people in Fundación Matía´s Geriatric Nursing Homes and Medium-Longterm Care Hospital leads us to reflect upon fallsof severely disabled users who are unable towalk autonomously.This has little to do with the concept of “GeriatricSyndrome – Falls”, but rather with adequategerontological care, as well as the need to establishthe level of risk and, adequate, physical restraintmeasures when needed
